pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Qwt library contains GUI Components and utility classes which are primarily useful for programs with a technical background. Besides a 2D plot widget it provides scales, sliders, dials, compasses, thermometers, wheels and knobs to control or display values, arrays or ranges of type double. This package is built using the qwt-6.1-multiaxes branch

use.flag: Use the MathML renderer of the Qt solutions package.
